info.title: Velorena API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Velorena Backend - Authentication and User Management

post.description: Register a new user with the provided information
Authenticate user with email and password
Logout the authenticated user and invalidate their token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve a paginated list of active categories with optional search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search categories by name (English or Arabic)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)

description.example: Professional business cards for companies and individuals

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific category

description.example: Professional business cards for companies and individuals

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of active products with optional filtering and search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search products by name (English or Arabic)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)

description.example: Professional business cards with various customization options

description_ar.example: بطاقات عمل احترافية مع خيارات تخصيص متنوعة

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product including its options and values

description.example: Professional business cards with various customization options

description_ar.example: بطاقات عمل احترافية مع خيارات تخصيص متنوعة
